caption:
Table 1: Comparison between our OadTR and other state-
of-the-art online action detection methods on the HDD [40]  dataset in terms of mAP (%).

Table 2: Comparison between our OadTR and other 
state-of-the-art online action detection methods on the 
TVSeries [10] dataset in terms of mcAP (%). Note that we 
use the same two-stream features for fair comparison.

Table 4: Performance comparison for different portions of actions on the TVSeries dataset in terms of mcAP (%). Note that 
the corresponding portions of actions are only used to compute mcAP after detecting current actions on all frame chunks in 
an online manner.
Table 5: Ablation studies.
